Sentencas: Reducing the operating temperature in the 500-750 degrees C range is needed for widespread use of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: High proton conduction in grain-boundary-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate films grown by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: Proton-conducting oxides are gaining wide interest as electrolyte materials for this aim.
Titulo: High proton conduction in grain-boundary-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate films grown by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: We report the fabrication of BaZr(0.8)Y(0.2)O(3-delta) (BZY) proton-conducting electrolyte thin films by pulsed laser deposition on different single-crystalline substrates.
Titulo: High proton conduction in grain-boundary-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate films grown by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: Highly textured, epitaxially oriented BZY films were obtained on (100)-oriented MgO substrates, showing the largest proton conductivity ever reported for BZY samples, being 0.11 S cm(-1) at 500 degrees C.
Titulo: High proton conduction in grain-boundary-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate films grown by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The excellent crystalline quality of BZY films allowed for the first time the experimental measurement of the large BZY bulk conductivity above 300 degrees C, expected in the absence of blocking grain boundaries.
Titulo: High proton conduction in grain-boundary-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate films grown by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The measured proton conductivity is also significantly larger than the conductivity values of oxygen-ion conductors in the same temperature range, opening new potential for the development of miniaturized SOFCs for portable power supply.
Titulo: High proton conduction in grain-boundary-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate films grown by pulsed laser deposition
